name: @aaronshaf/jk
description: Fast, API-driven Jenkins CLI for inspecting builds and failures

scripts.build: bun run build:cli && bun run build:lib && bun run build:types
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm
scripts.build:lib: bun build src/lib/index.ts src/lib/jenkins/index.ts src/lib/config/index.ts src/lib/effects/index.ts --outdir dist/lib --target node --format esm --splitting
scripts.build:types: tsup src/lib/index.ts src/lib/jenkins/index.ts src/lib/config/index.ts src/lib/effects/index.ts --dts-only --format esm --outDir dist/lib
scripts.prepare-publish: npm pkg set bin.jk=./dist/index.js && bun run typecheck && bun test && bun run build

author: Aaron Shafovaloff
